operational.state_currentMachineState.description: The current state of operation of the device.

operational.state_machineStates.description: The array of the possible operational states.

operational.state_runningTime.description: A string representing duration formatted as defined in ISO 8601. Allowable formats are: P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[n]H[n]M[n]S, P[n]W, P[n]Y[n]-M[n]-DT[0-23]H[0-59]:M[0-59]:S, and P[n]W, P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[0-23]H[0-59]M[0-59]S. P is mandatory, all other elements are optional, time elements must follow a T.

operational.state_remainingTime.description: A string representing duration formatted as defined in ISO 8601. Allowable formats are: P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[n]H[n]M[n]S, P[n]W, P[n]Y[n]-M[n]-DT[0-23]H[0-59]:M[0-59]:S, and P[n]W, P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[0-23]H[0-59]M[0-59]S. P is mandatory, all other elements are optional, time elements must follow a T.

operational.state_progressPercentage.description: The percentage completeness of the current jobState.

operational.state_jobStates.description: The Array of the possible job states.
